pipelines.name: anomaly_detection_mlops
pipelines.pipeline: multifilesrc loop=TRUE location=/home/pipeline-server/resources/videos/anomalib_pcb_test.avi name=source ! h264parse ! decodebin ! queue max-size-buffers=10 ! videoconvert ! gvaclassify name=classification inference-region=full-frame device=CPU pre-process-backend=opencv  ! gvametaconvert add-empty-results=true name=metaconvert ! queue ! gvafpscounter ! appsink name=destination

pipelines.name: anomaly_detection
pipelines.pipeline: {auto_source} name=source ! decodebin ! videoconvert ! gvaclassify name=classification inference-region=full-frame device=CPU pre-process-backend=opencv model-instance-id=inst0 ! gvametaconvert add-empty-results=true name=metaconvert ! queue ! gvafpscounter ! appsink name=destination
